title: Colour Contrast Determinator
creator: Vision Australia
description: A colour contrast analyser that makes it easy to find colour combinations with sufficient contrast. The HSL sliders visually indicate which values pass so you know in advance how to adjust the colour. Text alternatives are provided for the sliders so screen reader users can access the tool.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
